## ActivityInstancesQueryProps interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ActivityInstancesQueryProps
```

## Properties

| Property                                                                                | Modifiers | Type                                                                    | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [activityStates?](./extensions.activityinstancesqueryprops.activitystates.md)           |           | ReadonlyArray&lt;[ActivityState](./models.activitystate.md)<!-- -->&gt; | _(Optional)_ If specified, only Activity Instances which have one of the given Activity States will be returned.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [forAllUsers?](./extensions.activityinstancesqueryprops.forallusers.md)                 |           | boolean                                                                 | <p>_(Optional)_ When set to <code>false</code>, the results will be filtered on Assignee or Owner depending on the activity instance state: - Activity Instances in Assigned State are returned if they are assigned to the Current User or any groups of the Current User. - Activity Instances in other Activity States are returned if they are owned by the Current User</p><p>When set to <code>true</code>, the results are filtered by security instead. Only the Activity Instances on which the current user has Workflow Management rights (or system administration privileges) are returned.</p> |
| [processDefinitionId?](./extensions.activityinstancesqueryprops.processdefinitionid.md) |           | [ItemUri](./models.itemuri.md)                                          | _(Optional)_ If specified, only Activity Instances based on the given Process Definition will be returned.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
